A theta of 0.60 allows me to be competitive while conserving energy for future hunts.

I chose this theta because the sheep population is decreasing, which means food is becoming scarcer. By reducing my hunting intensity to 0.50, I can conserve energy and avoid overexertion while still being able to hunt effectively. This balance helps ensure my survival in a challenging environment.
